Oops - just discovered I was running this with java 1.5 beta 1.
I dont know if thats the cause or not.

Java 1.5 shouldn't be the problem.
Which version of Eclipse were you using ?

Java Model Listener no longer exists in Java debugger (instead, we use 
refactorings to update breakpoints).
